verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother<s%>, to <S%G5371>Philemon<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4904>fellow-worker<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G27>to<s%> <S%G682>Apphia<s%> our <S%G2532>sister<s%>, and <S%G27>to<s%> <S%G751>Archippus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4961>fellow-soldier<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%>, <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%>,

hearing <S%G191><s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>;

that <S%G3704><s%> the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1756>effectual<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> good <S%G18>thing<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3874>comfort<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4698>hearts<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> have been <S%G373>refreshed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G80>brother<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%>, though I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>all<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2004>enjoin<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> that which is <S%G433>befitting<s%>,

yet <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3870>I<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3870>beseech<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> the <S%G4246>aged<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%>, <S%G3682>Onesimus<s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G890>unprofitable<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> is <S%G2173>profitable<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%>:
whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G375>back<s%> to thee4771, 1161 <S%G4355>in<s%> his own <S%G846>person<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, my <S%G1699>very<s%> <S%G4698>heart<s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1014>would<s%> fain have <S%G2722>kept<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G1683>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5228>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5228>behalf<s%> he might <S%G1247>minister<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1199>bonds<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G4674>thy<s%> <S%G1106>mind<s%> <S%G2309>I<s%> would <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G18>goodness<s%> <S%G5600>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> as <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> free <S%G1595>will<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5029>perhaps<s%> <S%G5563>he<s%> was <S%G5124>therefore<s%> <S%G5563>parted<s%> from thee <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G5610>season<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for <S%G166>ever<s%>;

no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5228>more<s%> than a <S%G1401>servant<s%>, a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G3122>specially<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> how <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> thou <S%G2192>countest<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> a <S%G2844>partner<s%>, <S%G4355>receive<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1691>myself<s%>.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> he hath <S%G91>wronged<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> at <S%G2228>all<s%>, or <S%G3784>oweth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1677>aught<s%>, put <S%G5124>that<s%> to <S%G1698>mine<s%> <S%G1677>account<s%>;

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G1473>it<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G661>repay<s%> <S%G2443>it<s%>: that I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G4359>owest<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> thine own <S%G4572>self<s%> <S%G4359>besides<s%>.

Yea <S%G3483><s%>, <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G3685>let<s%> <S%G1473>me<s%> have <S%G3685>joy<s%> of <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G373>refresh<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4698>heart<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2962>Christ<s%>.

Having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G5218>in<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou wilt <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> what I <S%G3004>say<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G260>withal<s%> <S%G2090>prepare<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G3578>lodging<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> I shall be <S%G5483>granted<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>.
Epaphras <S%G1889><s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4869>fellow-prisoner<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>;
and so do <S%G3138>Mark<s%>, <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%>, <S%G1214>Demas<s%>, <S%G3065>Luke<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%>.
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
